subject: Baseball
Citizenship and Naturalization
Immigration and Emigration
lead_paragraph: The beloved former Dodgers pitcher was one of 8,000 people who, on July 22, took the oath of allegiance in a naturalization ceremony in July in Los Angeles.
snippet: The beloved former Dodgers pitcher was one of 8,000 people who, on July 22, took the oath of allegiance in a naturalization ceremony in July in Los Angeles.
